data.title: Best of Belize
data.text: I'm from Belize and eating here is like being at home, delicious authentic belizean cuisine. This place has the best of Belize to offer and has activities such as singing on the Saturday nights.

data.title: Little Belize In Inglewood
data.text: We enjoy the atmosphere and the food is very good.  We did take-out but you can eat there as well. The people are very nice, helpful and friendly and the service is just as good. Try it for yourself.  My wife and I like it. I believe it's under new management but it's always been good food.

data.title: Homestyle Cooking and Really Delicious
data.text: Absolutely everything is made from scratch. We tried the appetizer sampler, fried bread, meat pie, oxtail stew with beans and rice and the stewed chicken with grits.  Everything was fresh, flavorful and delicious.  The food was nicely flavored with a blend of spices.  The food was not hot or spicy.   The oxtail stew was melt in your mouth good and the sauce on the stewed chicken, made with caramelized onions, was amazingly delicious.  The beans and rice were extraordinarily flavorful.
